title: @Riot I accidentally disenchanted my exclusive DeathSworn Ward skin
body:
I accidentally disenchanted the exclusive deathsworn ward skin and was wondering if it's possible to regain the ward skin?
if possible thanks!

replies.body: Uh oh!  We might be able to help out here.  :D  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see if we can do something about this with you individually.  We'll see you there!
